channel.title: NRS3server V4
channel.description:
As You all know nrs3server has had its share of updates bugs glitches we have finally crossed the stage were we have patched almost all bugs glitches and dupes
Our new goal now is to find an excellent forums developer we have purchased an IPB forums and now are in the middle of processing it
If you have any qualifications to this and would like to apply for the official NRS3server v4 Project as the forums developer i will gladly accept you after you fill out the following form
Please remember we are only looking for those people who will be able to properly Use IPB forums
[code]Name: 1. What is you Main Language for Programming: 2. Would you consider yourself a good developer: 3. Do you have any Experience with IPB Forums: 4. If answer to above is yes show proof: 5. Contant Information (skype/Msn): [/code]

item.title: NRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:

Team_Rocket:

All spots filled?

item.title: NRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

we have found what we were looking for thank you for everyone’s contributions we no longer need anymore developers

all spots are full feel free to still be a beta tester for our new 718/734 update

we have made a new world also still in progress we have yet to make more items available to the public this new world will not be eco based it will be spawning

Read full topic

item.title: NRS3server V4
item.dc:creator: @I_Hybrid_I1 I_Hybrid_I
item.description:
@I_Hybrid_I1 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:461956”][quote author=supaz link=topic=564908.msg4112783#msg4112783 date=1348700085]
Hello, I’m not very well known here, but I can assure you I know what i’m doing. So I am applying below,

  1. HTML & PHP. Not forgetting Java & JS.
  2. Not trying to seem cocky, but I just don’t ‘think’ I know how to web develop, I KNOW how to web develop. So the answer is Yes.
  3. I know IPB in and out, I actually nulled a few for DGT. I programmed for a friend of mine using cakePHP framework while creating a web based RPG called Naxasius
  4. Private message the Administrator on DGT. Or check out the game naxasius.com (it’s open source now).
  5. Skype: LoganGar // MSN: Logang2009@hotmail.com

If you have any further questions, by all means message me.
–Logan
[/quote]
Look at your signature.

I smell a fake :|[/quote]
This thread smells you

Read full topic
